Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of the movie 'Aaja Nachle' released in 2007?
Options:
A. The shooting of 'Aaja Nachle' began on 15 January 2007.
B. The entire production of 'Aaja Nachle' took place in Los Angeles.
C. Shooting for 'Aaja Nachle' was completed in March 2007.
D. Film City in Mumbai was one of the locations used for the production.
Correct Answer: The shooting of 'Aaja Nachle' began on 15 January 2007., Shooting for 'Aaja Nachle' was completed in March 2007., Film City in Mumbai was one of the locations used for the production.
